_sText:
**DETAILED STAIRWAY PREFAB**

**Author:** Alberto309 (credit me if you use it)
**Work time:** half hour


There are two files, the VMF (used in Hammer) and the BSP (used in game in case you want to see the prefab by yourself before compiling).


**INSTALL BSP FILE:**

**BSP directory:** C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps


**USE VMF FILE:**

Just put the "detailed_stairway.vmf" file in a desired place of you computer, and then open the file with Valve Hammer Editor by clicking on "File -> Open" and search for the file.
To use the prefab on your map just select the stairs with the "Selection Tool" (red arrow),copy
and paste in your map, and then place the prefab wherever you want.


Thank you for downloading the file.
_Don't forget to rate the prefab and credit me if you release any of your map with my prefab!_



**Alberto309**
